questions.question: Why did relations between Crassus and Pompey become tense in 57?
options: Clodius, supported by Crassus, was harassing Pompey, and Pompey backed a rival
They disagreed over Caesar’s command in Gaul.
Pompey refused to support Crassus' eastern campaign.

What did Crassus have to gain from a renewal of the Triumvirate?
options: A chance to gain a command to get glory and prestige to rival Pompey and Caesar

questions.question: What did Pompey have to gain from a renewal of the Triumvirate?
options: He wanted to expand into Egypt
He had no guarantee of support by the optimates if he broke the alliance
He sought control over the Senate

questions.question: What did Caesar have to gain from a renewal of the Triumvirate?
options: He wanted to move against Crassus
He had yet to complete his conquest of Gaul.
He wanted to become consul again
